Uses of Package
org.apache.drill.exec.physical.impl.scan.framework

Packages that use org.apache.drill.exec.physical.impl.scan.framework
Package
Description
org.apache.drill.exec.physical.impl.scan.columns
Handles the special "columns" column used by the text reader, and available to similar readers.
org.apache.drill.exec.physical.impl.scan.file
Handles optional file metadata columns: implicit columns and partition columns.
org.apache.drill.exec.physical.impl.scan.framework
Defines the projection, vector continuity and other operations for a set of one or more readers.
org.apache.drill.exec.store.dfs.easy
 
org.apache.drill.exec.store.easy.json
 
org.apache.drill.exec.store.enumerable
 
org.apache.drill.exec.store.googlesheets

org.apache.drill.exec.store.iceberg.read
 
org.apache.drill.exec.store.image
 
org.apache.drill.exec.store.jdbc
 
org.apache.drill.exec.store.kafka
Kafka storage plugin.
org.apache.drill.exec.store.kafka.decoders
 
org.apache.drill.exec.store.mock
Defines a mock data source which generates dummy test data for use in testing.
org.apache.drill.exec.store.phoenix
 
org.apache.drill.exec.store.splunk
 
  • Classes in org.apache.drill.exec.physical.impl.scan.framework used by org.apache.drill.exec.physical.impl.scan.columns
    Class
    Description
    ManagedScanFramework
    Basic scan framework for a "managed" reader which uses the scan schema mechanisms encapsulated in the scan schema orchestrator.
    ManagedScanFramework.ScanFrameworkBuilder
     
    SchemaNegotiator
    Negotiates the table schema with the scanner framework and provides context information for the reader.
    SchemaNegotiatorImpl
    Implementation of the schema negotiation between scan operator and batch reader.
  • Classes in org.apache.drill.exec.physical.impl.scan.framework used by org.apache.drill.exec.physical.impl.scan.file
    Class
    Description
    ManagedReader
    Extended version of a record reader which uses a size-aware batch mutator.
    ManagedScanFramework
    Basic scan framework for a "managed" reader which uses the scan schema mechanisms encapsulated in the scan schema orchestrator.
    ManagedScanFramework.ReaderFactory
    Creates a batch reader on demand.
    ManagedScanFramework.ScanFrameworkBuilder
     
    SchemaNegotiator
    Negotiates the table schema with the scanner framework and provides context information for the reader.
    SchemaNegotiatorImpl
    Implementation of the schema negotiation between scan operator and batch reader.
    ShimBatchReader
    Represents a layer of row batch reader that works with a result set loader and schema manager to structure the data read by the actual row batch reader.
